deploy.startCommand: dumb-init sh -c 'echo "Starting Outline..." && echo "Environment check:" && echo "URL=$URL" && echo "PORT=$PORT" && echo "NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV" && echo "Checking build files:" && ls -la /app/build/app/ && echo "Checking manifest:" && cat /app/build/app/.vite/manifest.json | head -10 && yarn db:migrate && echo "Database migrated, starting server..." && node build/server/index.js --services=cron,collaboration,websockets,admin,web,worker'
